name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TTT - To Do, To Read, To Complete!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your tasks organized with TTT—a simple, minimalist to-do list extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your productivity with TTT - To Do, To Read, To Complete!—a simple, minimalist Chrome extension designed to streamline your task management. Whether you're organizing daily to-dos, saving articles to read later, or tracking your progress, this extension helps you effortlessly prioritize and manage your activities in one intuitive interface.

Key Features:

Effortless Task Management: Easily add, edit, and categorize tasks into "Today," "Later," and "Completed." Switch between these categories with a click, and use the expandable headings to keep your workspace clutter-free.
Intuitive Drag-and-Drop: Quickly reorganize tasks by dragging them between "Today" and "Later," even when lists are collapsed, allowing your workflow to adapt seamlessly to your changing priorities.
Real-Time Badge Notifications: Stay on top of your tasks with dynamic badge notifications that update in real-time, showing you exactly how many tasks are left to complete.
User-Friendly Tab Navigation: Navigate between your "Tasks" and "Completed" tabs with ease. Inactive tabs are light grey for clarity, with active and hovered tabs highlighted for better visibility.
Sleek and Minimalist Design: Enjoy a clean, modern interface with a soothing green color palette, thoughtfully designed to be both visually pleasing and functional.
Why Choose TTT - To Do, To Read, To Complete!?
By organizing your daily tasks, reading lists, and related websites in a single, minimalistic tool, TTT empowers you to focus on what truly matters, ensuring nothing falls through the cracks. Whether you're a professional, student, or anyone looking to optimize their routine, TTT simplifies productivity and makes it more satisfying.

Get Started:
Add TTT - To Do, To Read, To Complete! to Chrome today and discover the ease of having all your tasks and reading lists organized in one sleek, intuitive tool. Your journey to enhanced productivity begins here!
